title: Who wants to help honor old WW?
body:
Lemme know, I'll send you a discord link.

Rules: Furry champions only. (I'm being hilarious) 
IE: Rengar, all male yordles count. Ahri/Nidalee counts, Alistar etc.

If I get a few of you (I only need two)
Then I'll start swapping people in and out.

replies.body:
> Rules: Furry champions only. (I'm being hilarious) 
> IE: Rengar, all male yordles count. Ahri/Nidalee counts, Alistar etc.

Question: Does Valor count?

EDIT: Why downvote? I'm just looking for clarification...

Along the same lines:
Does Bristle count?

Sejueni and Quinn lol

OK, then... what about Nunu then?
Surely Willump counts as a furry!
And Kindred ofc.
